sentences.en: Application acne, acne, and the imprint left by the Depression.
sentences.cn: 粉刺 、 青春痘 、 及其留下的凹陷印痕.

sentences.en: As I arrived, the shimmering skyline of domes and minarets was imprinted on my memory.
sentences.cn: 当我到达时，穹顶和尖塔形成的泛着微光的空中轮廓线铭刻在我的记忆中。

sentences.en: Bette Davis will imprint her unique personality on any role she plays.
sentences.cn: 蓓蒂·戴维斯不论扮演什么角色都体现出她自己独特的性格.

sentences.en: Can excuse me dot mole stay imprint? General cost how many? Safe?
sentences.cn: 请问点痣会留下印 吗 ?一般费用多少? 是否安全?

sentences.en: He repeated the names, as if to imprint them in his mind.
sentences.cn: 他一遍遍重复着那些名字，仿佛要把它们铭刻在心里。

sentences.en: His head left an imprint on the pillow.
sentences.cn: 他的头在枕上留下印痕.

sentences.en: I feel there isn't any of him that does not need the imprint of my lips.
sentences.cn: 我觉得都有我嘴唇放上去的需要.

sentences.en: Introduced a net to imprint advertising sort and its application feature.
sentences.cn: 介绍了网印广告的种类及其应用特征.

sentences.en: May I take an imprint of your card, please?
sentences.cn: 可以拿您的信用卡去划一下 吗 ?

sentences.en: She could see the imprint of her fingers on his pale face.
sentences.cn: 她可以看到自己的手指在他苍白的脸上留下的印痕。

sentences.en: Solution: fine - tune gripper teeth pad with Nano - imprint lithography drum edge.
sentences.cn: 处置办法: 澈底调不静递纸牙牙垫同压印滚筒外的隔断.

sentences.en: That dictionary is published under the Longman imprint.
sentences.cn: 那本词典以朗曼公司的名义出版.

sentences.en: The ceramics bore the imprint of Luca della Robbia.
sentences.cn: 陶器上印有卢卡·德拉·罗比亚的字样.

sentences.en: The company carries a variety of binders that can be imprinted with your message or logo.
sentences.cn: 该公司经营各种可以印上客户所需信息或标识的活页夹。

sentences.en: The image was absolutely terrible and left an indelible imprint on me.
sentences.cn: 这种形象非常可怕,给我留下了不可磨灭的印象.

sentences.en: The imprint of the tide water becomes the concept for this design.
sentences.cn: 该设计旨在使得游客通过湿地到达顺天湾,而退潮的印记就成了该项目的设计理念.

sentences.en: The sinister atmosphere of the place left an indelible imprint on my memory.
sentences.cn: 此处不祥的氛围在我的记忆中刻下了不可磨灭的印记.

sentences.en: They splash into the dust and imprint the windows with individual signatures.
sentences.cn: 它们泼溅着落入灰尘中并在窗玻璃上留下自己的印记.

words.tran_cn: 铭记（动物生命早期即起作用的一种学习机能）；胚教
印记；[法]痕迹；特征；版本说明

trans.tran_cn: 盖印，痕迹，特征，版权标记
trans.tran_en: the mark left by an object being pressed into or onto something
If a surface is imprinted with a mark or design, that mark or design is printed on the surface or pressed into it
to print or press the mark of an object on something
